title: THOUGHT / WHAT LIES BENEATH
description: Broke into Cuno's parents' room and communist apartment and Gary's apartment and church – counter. Global thought after 2.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "Master Investigator! You just can't..."
dialogueTree.english: Master Investigator! You just can't keep yourself away from locked and hidden places, can you?
dialogueTree.polish: Mistrzu śledczy! Nie umiesz się powstrzymać przed wchodzeniem w zamknięte i ukryte miejsca, co?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Майстра следчы! Не можаш утрымацца, каб не заходзіць у закрытыя і схаваныя месцы, праўда?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Nothing. Nothing! You're right -- g..."
links.english: Nothing. Nothing! You're right -- get in there... deep. Invade every personal space, break every lock...
links.polish: Nic. Nic! To słuszne – pchaj się tam. Głęboko. Narusz każdą przestrzeń osobistą, otwórz każdy zamek...
links.belarusian: Нішто. Нішто! Гэта правільна – праштурхвайся туды. Глыбока. Парушай кожную асабістую прастору, адчыняй кожны замок...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, that's what it is... a quick p..."
links.english: Yes, that's what it is... a quick peek here, a short glance there. It is all quite... delectable.
links.polish: Tak, o to właśnie chodzi. Rzut oka tu, szybkie zerknięcie tam. To wręcz... przepyszne.
links.belarusian: Так, пра тое гаворка. Кінуць погляд сюды, хутка зірнуць туды. Гэта проста... смачна.

links.title: You: "It is my duty as a cop to investiga..."
links.english: It is my duty as a cop to investigate every square inch of this world.
links.polish: Moim obowiązkiem jako policjanta jest zbadać każdy zakątek tego świata.
links.belarusian: Мая абавязак як паліцэйскага — даследаваць кожны куток гэтага свету.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Attaboy! The world's secrets were m..."
links.english: Attaboy! The world's secrets were made for you. They wait patiently for you to uncover them...
links.polish: Zuch chłopak! Tajemnice świata powstały z myślą o tobie. Czekają cierpliwie, aż je ujawnisz...
links.belarusian: Малайчына хлапец! Таямніцы свету ўзніклі з думкай пра цябе. Чакаюць цярпліва, пакуль ты іх раскрыеш...

links.title: You: "Hey! I am not some sort of a... pee..."
links.english: Hey! I am not some sort of a... peeper.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Sure, friend. This is nothing sordi..."
links.english: Sure, friend. This is nothing sordid, nothing inappropriate. You just *have* to do this... it's your duty.
links.polish: Oczywiście, przyjacielu. To nic podłego, nic niestosownego. Po prostu *musisz* to robić. To twój obowiązek.
links.belarusian: Вядома, сябра. Гэта нічога кепскага, нічога няправільнага. Проста *ты павінен* гэта рабіць. Гэта твая абавязак.
